member.name: T:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.InappPurchase
member.summary: A Purchase resource indicates the status of a user's subscription purchase.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.InappPurchase.ConsumptionState
member.summary: The consumption state of the inapp product. Possible values are: - - Consumed - - Yet to be consumed

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.InappPurchase.DeveloperPayload
member.summary: A developer-specified string that contains supplemental information about an order.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.InappPurchase.Kind
member.summary: This kind represents a inappPurchase object in the androidpublisher service.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.InappPurchase.PurchaseState
member.summary: The purchase state of the order. Possible values are: - - Purchased - - Cancelled

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.InappPurchase.PurchaseTime
member.summary: The time the product was purchased, in milliseconds since the epoch (Jan 1, 1970).

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase
member.summary: A Purchase resource indicates the status of a user's subscription purchase.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.AutoRenewing
member.summary: Whether the subscription will automatically be renewed when it reaches its current expiry time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.InitiationTimestampMsec
member.summary: Time at which the subscription was granted, in milliseconds since Epoch.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.Kind
member.summary: This kind represents a subscriptionPurchase object in the androidpublisher service.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.ValidUntilTimestampMsec
member.summary: Time at which the subscription will expire, in milliseconds since Epoch.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks the purchase and consumption status of an inapp item.
member.param: Required - The package name of the application the inapp product was sold in (for example, 'com.some.thing').
Required - The inapp product SKU (for example, 'com.some.thing.inapp1').
Required - The token provided to the user's device when the inapp product was purchased.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.Alt
member.summary: Data format for the response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.Fields
member.summary: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.QuotaUser
member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.UserIp
member.summary: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.PackageName
member.summary: The package name of the application the inapp product was sold in (for example, 'com.some.thing').

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.ProductId
member.summary: The inapp product SKU (for example, 'com.some.thing.inapp1').

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.InapppurchasesResource.GetRequest.Token
member.summary: The token provided to the user's device when the inapp product was purchased.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.PurchasesResource.Cancel(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Cancels a user's subscription purchase. The subscription remains valid until its expiration time.
member.param: Required - The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').
Required - The purchased subscription ID (for example, 'monthly001').
Required - The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1_1.PurchasesResource.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a user's subscription purchase is valid and returns its expiry time.
member.param: Required - The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').
Required - The purchased subscription ID (for example, 'monthly001').
Required - The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.
